title: Tier II and III cities to be growth drivers over the next 2 yrs: Sundaram Home Finance - Economic Times
content: Tier II and III cities to be growth drivers over the next 2 yrs: Sundaram Home Finance  Economic Times
description: The residential market has gathered momentum post second wave and buyers have been back exploring several options. There is renewed confidence among the buyers and the general buoyancy in the market is reflected by the number of new projects, company Managing Director D Lakshminarayanan said.
